quote_first: When Teddy Carella walkied into the squad room at
quote_last: , Peter Byrnes thought he would have a heart attack.
title: Killer's Wedge
author: Ed McBain

quote_last:
at night,
And the wind it blew with all its might,
And the rain came pouring down,
And the dark clouds seem’d to frown,
title: The Tay Bridge Disaster
author: William McGonagall
